title: If There's One Brand to Shop at Nordstrom Right Now, It’s Definitively This One—Did I Mention Everything is Under $100?
author: Jennifer Camp Forbes
text: As a fashion industry veteran of over 15 years, I am rarely impressed when it comes to affordable fashion beyond the obvious favorites like Zara, Mango, and H&M. So imagine my delight in finding a hidden gem with a plethora of stellar under-$100 finds at Nordstrom, one of my main go-tos for shopping. The brand? Open Edit. Every piece clearly reflects the most current trends, especially those that have more of an elevated, timeless feel, which is exactly why fashion people are shopping it more than ever.I set out to roundup my latest top Open Edit picks with some visual outfit inspiration to act as a styling guide for the season. Most can easily be mixed and matched to create a capsule wardrobe of sorts. Some of the standouts are linen pieces like drawstring pants and polished vests, of-the-moment heeled flip-flop sandals, and pretty skirts that are guaranteed to get compliments. Scroll on to discover the and shop the best of the best Open Edit pieces right now.Shop Open Edit Open Edit Cotton Poplin Maxi Skirt Open Edit Notched Lapel Vest Open Edit Lace Trim Satin Chemise Open Edit Pendant Slider Necklace Open Edit Ponte Flare Pants Open Edit Sculpt V-Neck Tank Open Edit Wide Leg Linen Blend Pants Open Edit Remington Ankle Strap Sandal Such a chic shade of red. Open Edit Sleeveless Lace Maxi Dress Cool little black dress alert. Open Edit Crepe Capri Leggings Open Edit Smooth Edit Lite Cap Sleeve T-Shirt Great for stocking up on. Open Edit Tori Kitten Heel Sandal I want these in every color. Open Edit Tiered Maxi Skirt Open Edit Linen Blend Shift Dress Open Edit Everyday One-Button Linen Blend Blazer Open Edit Linen Blend Vest I want this in black as well. Open Edit Linen Blend Skirt To wear with the vest above. Open Edit Korva Slide Sandal Comfortable without sacrificing style. Open Edit Boat Neck Sleeveless Top Fashion people love this easy top. Open Edit Curved Waist Strapless Maxi Dress
html:
As a fashion industry veteran of over 15 years, I am rarely impressed when it comes to affordable fashion beyond the obvious favorites like Zara, Mango, and H&M. So imagine my delight in finding a hidden gem with a plethora of stellar under-$100 finds at Nordstrom, one of my main go-tos for shopping. The brand? Open Edit. Every piece clearly reflects the most current trends, especially those that have more of an elevated, timeless feel, which is exactly why fashion people are shopping it more than ever.

I set out to roundup my latest top Open Edit picks with some visual outfit inspiration to act as a styling guide for the season. Most can easily be mixed and matched to create a capsule wardrobe of sorts. Some of the standouts are linen pieces like drawstring pants and polished vests, of-the-moment heeled flip-flop sandals, and pretty skirts that are guaranteed to get compliments. Scroll on to discover the and shop the best of the best Open Edit pieces right now.
